## Before Asking

Before submitting a question, please check these resources:

- [ ] I have read the [documentation](https://reasonkit.sh/docs)
- [ ] I have searched [existing issues](https://github.com/reasonkit/reasonkit-core/issues?q=is%3Aissue)
- [ ] I have checked [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/reasonkit/reasonkit-core/discussions)

---

## Need Real-Time Help?

For faster responses and interactive help, consider:

- **Discussions**: Post in [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/reasonkit/reasonkit-core/discussions) for community Q&A
